description: Single storey rear extension; raised patio at rear; installation of boundary fence to rear; front porch
decision_conditions: <p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the southern side elevation with no. 48 Central Avenue of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p><div><br></div>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p>Approved Plans</p><p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>50centralavenue/2024/01 – Existing Ground Floor Plan; 50centralavenue/2024/02 – Existing Elevations; 50centralavenue/2024/03 – Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 50centralavenue/2024/04 – Proposed Elevations; 50centralavenue/2024/05 [Site] Location Plan and Block Plan; Fire Safety - Reasonable Exemption Statement</p><p>All plans received 11.09.24&nbsp;</p><div><br></div>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
